item.title: Java Basic
item.description:
Language Basic

  • Language Basic
  • Get Started with Java
    • Java Language Basics
    • Java Arrays

같은 주제를 다루지만 프로그래밍 기초를 다지는 데 더 알맞은 자료

  • Learning Java
    • Lecture 1 - Types, Variables, Operators
    • Lecture 2 - More Types, Methods, Conditionals
    • Lecture 3 - Loops, Arrays
  • Java Notes
    • Chapter 1: Overview: The Mental Landscape
    • Chapter 2: Programming in the Small I: Names and Things
    • Chapter 3: Programming in the Small II: Control
    • Chapter 4: Programming in the Large I: Subroutines
    • Chapter 7: Arrays, ArrayLists, and Records
      • Section 1: Array Details
      • Section 2: Array Processing
  • Introduction to Programming in Java
    • Chapter 1: Elements of Programming
    • Chapter 2: Functions

Numbers & Strings

  • Numbers & Strings
  • Number class in Java
    • Wrapper Classes in Java
    • Guide to the Number Class in Java
  • Get Started with Java - Java Strings

디지털 기기에서 실수를 정확히 표현할 수 없기 때문에 생기는 문제와 해법

  • Floating Point
  • Overflow and Underflow in Java
  • Comparing Doubles in Java

Classes & Objects

  • Classes & Objects
  • Get Started with Java - Java OOP
  • Difference Between == and equals() in Java
  • Comparing Objects in Java

프로그래밍 기초를 다지는 데 더 알맞은 자료

  • Learning Java의 Lecture 4 - Classes and Objects
  • Java Notes의 Chapter 5: Programming in the Large II: Objects and Classes

  • 보충 자료
    • equals() & hashCode()
      • Java equals() and hashCode() Contracts
      • Guide to hashCode() in Java
    • Software Construnction - 15: Equality

    • Java Notes

        • Section 2: Writing Correct Programs
        • Section 3: Exceptions and try..catch
      • Chapter 11: Input/Output Streams, Files, and Networking
        • Section 1: I/O Streams, Readers, and Writers
        • Section 2: Files
        • Section 3: Programming With Files

Collections

  • Collections
  • Get Started with Java - Java Collections
  • 프로그래밍 기초를 다지는 데 더 알맞은 자료
    • Java Notes
      • Chapter 7: Arrays, ArrayLists, and Records의 Section 3: ArrayList
      • Chapter 10: Generic Programming and Collection Classes
  • 보충 자료

Concurrency & Networking

  • Essential Java Classes - Concurrency

    • Working with URLs
    • All About Sockets
    • All About Datagrams

item.title: Java Backend
item.description:
2024년 개편을 앞두고 세부 내용을 정리하고 있습니다.
  • 약 4개월 연수 과정을 정리합니다.
  • 먼저 Java 기초를 다집니다.

Backend Basic

강의 교수 시수
Database, JDBC, Servlet, JSP Academy 4 ~ 5주
Project - 3 ~ 4주

Spring

강의 교수 시수
Core, MVC, JPA, Security, Boot Dooray ~ 4주
Project Academy ~ 4주
